channel.title: python3.8 on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in python3.8 on Memo Tut

item.title: Even beginners want to say I understand Python completely
item.description: My child: "Oh, oh, oh, oh! Don't understand Python at all!!" I’m sorry, my child who is new to Python doesn’t know Python and doesn’t have it today…” I can’t say that Python is easy for anyone to program, but I don’t think the super-convenient features that are so boring are known to me. Moreover, when I try to use a convenient feature, it makes no sense at all. Nana no.

item.title: python3.8 jupyter notebook in venv environment
item.description: > Information as of 2019 1124. I write so lightly that I die because I am sleepy. 20191227 Addendum This article seems to be in demand Starting confirmation and initial setting. python install I’m using the py launcher, so I cannot pass the path to python. venv environment creation Environment creation. Then activate it. Console is git-bash $ py -m venv hoge $ .hoge/scripts/activate install jupyter under venv environment Update pip and install jupyter.
